landpage.combine: Combine is a dynamic, colorful and full of shapes game.
landpage.desc_combine: Combine the objects in a dynamic, colorful and full of shapes game. Each shape that appears sliding is a new challenge, be quick and attentive or it will be the end of the game.
landpage.desc_combineFim: Have a good time! Or rather ... Combine!
landpage.combineGoogle: Download Combine! on the Google Play
landpage.combineApple: Download Combine! on the App Store
landpage.tapple: Tapple! Feel jumping hopscotch with your fingers. Tapple is a game  that challenges your concentration and reaction speed.

title.about: Introduction. Hello World! I'm ALESSANDRO EMANUEL, live in Recife - Brazil. Developer from: games, apps and website (front-end). My main skills are: HTML5, JS/JQuery, CSS3, swift for iOS, java for android, C# for unity and win mobile. my others skills are: 2D/3D animations, UI/UX design and some brandings.
title.end: Rights Alessandro Emanuel. Here is the end of page
